sentences.sContent: Strange I was stubborn like duplicity said every word is the public taste.
sentences.sContent_eng: Strange I was stubborn like duplicity said every word is the public taste.
sentences.sCn: 怪我生性倔强喜欢口是心非说的每一句话都不合大众口味。

sentences.sContent: Since the promotion of a new era is more focused on inner beauty why duplicity of people to meet others vanity and so praised it?
sentences.sContent_eng: Since the promotion of a new era is more focused on inner beauty why duplicity of people to meet others vanity and so praised it?
sentences.sCn: 既然新时代提倡的是更加注重于内在美，那为什么口是心非的人为了满足他人的虚荣心而如此称赞呢？

synos.tran: 口是心非；表里不一；不诚实

remMethod.val: du(二) + plic(重叠) + ity → 有两种(态度) → 口是心非
